title: Eventide Teleporter
description:
This project is meant to replace the simple teleport module I used for a long time. With foundry's new teleport system. Basically what this does is allows a keybinding (default: m) to do the following:

  1. Set the currently selected tokens to teleport movement.

  2. Set the GM's movement mode to unconstrained movement.

  3. Move the token to where you're hovering when you press m stacked.

  4. Set the selected tokens back to their original movement mode and the GM's movement settings back to whatever they were prior to the process starting.

It will have a button on the left-hand side to enable and disable it so you don't do this unintentionally.
